        public Organism​(boolean randomAge,
                Field field,
                Location location,
                Simulator simulator)
        Creates a new object of type Organism
        Parameters:
        randomAge - specifies whether this organism's starting age should be random, or 0
        field - The field currently occupied
        location - The location within the field
        simulator - Used to pass a reference to the main simulator class
